page.title: 06FARMING: WIVERTON HALL
page.content: The majority of the land at Wiverton is farmed on the arable system, and some stock is grazed at Smite Hill and Hall Farm. These farms are tenanted at an average rent of Â£60 per acre and are administered by the Crown Commissioners. They average about 300 acres. Three or four men work on the farms and are housed in cottages on the estate. These cottages are modernised and are rent and rate free. Every three years the Crown Commissioners meet the agents and visit every farm and a social event follows in the evening at Grantham.
